content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day September 12, 2022 What is Microsoft Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection? September 12, 2022 Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection also known as ATP and Defender can provide your organization with advanced security features  keeping you protected from cybersecurity threats. With todays cybersecurity landscape, where new threats appear daily, if not hourly, its critical to know what tools can help you protect your organization.
